title: performance profiling plan
description: plan a short profiling session to identify hotspots and measure impact.
context: measure before change; isolate variables; keep runs comparable.
instructions: 1) pick representative scenarios and data. 2) choose profiling tools and granularity. 3) run baseline and collect metrics. 4) propose next experiments and success criteria.
